channel.title: PHE on Sam Abbott
channel.description: Recent content in PHE on Sam Abbott

item.title: Exploring Tuberculosis Monitoring Indicators in England; Using Dimension Reduction and Clustering
item.description: Introduction I recently attended the Public Health Research and Science Conference, run by Public Health England (PHE), at the University of Warwick. I was mainly there to present some work that I have been doing (along with my co-authors) estimating the direct effects of the 2005 change in BCG vaccination policy on Tuberculosis (TB) incidence rates (slides) but it was also a great opportunity to see what research is being done within, and partnered with, PHE.
